name: Forbidden
message: The server understood the request, but refuses to authorize it.
details: Ensure you have sufficient permissions to access this resource.

name: BadRequest
message: The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax.
details: Check if the request syntax is correct.

name: RangeNotSatisfiable
message: The client has asked for a portion of the file, but the server cannot supply that portion.
details: Adjust the range requested in the Range header.

name: UnprocessableEntity
message: The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.
details: Fix the semantic errors in the request.

name: ProxyAuthenticationRequired
message: The client must first authenticate itself with the proxy.
details: Provide valid proxy authentication.

name: LengthRequired
message: The server refuses to accept the request without a defined Content-Length header.
details: Set a Content-Length header.

name: RequestTimeout
message: The client did not produce a request within the time that the server was prepared to wait.
details: Increase timeout or check network.

name: NotFound
message: The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI.
details: Verify the requested resource exists.

name: IAmATeapot
message: Any attempt to instruct the teapot to brew coffee should result in the error code '418 I'm a teapot'.
details: It's a joke error.

name: ExpectationFailed
message: The server cannot meet the requirements of the Expect request-header field.
details: Check the Expect header.

name: ServiceUnavailable
message: The server is currently unable to handle the request due to temporary overloading or maintenance.
details: Wait and try again later.

name: VariantAlsoNegotiates
message: The server has an internal configuration error: the chosen variant resource is itself a negotiable resource.
details: Correct the server configuration.

name: BadGateway
message: The server, while acting as a gateway or proxy, received an invalid response from the upstream server.
details: Check the upstream server for issues.

name: HTTPVersionNotSupported
message: The server does not support the HTTP protocol version that was used in the request.
details: Check the HTTP version being used.

name: NotImplemented
message: The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.
details: Ensure the server supports the required functionality.

name: GatewayTimeout
message: The server, while acting as a gateway or proxy, did not receive a timely response from the upstream server.
details: Increase the timeout or check upstream server.

name: InternalServerError
message: The server encountered an internal error or misconfiguration and was unable to complete your request.
details: Check server logs for further details.

name: InsufficientStorage
message: The server is unable to store the representation needed to complete the request.
details: Increase server storage capacity.

name: NotExtended
message: The policy for accessing the resource has not been met in the request.
details: Ensure the required policy is followed.

name: LoopDetected
message: The server detected an infinite loop while processing a request.
details: Fix the loop in the server logic.
